full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHEGS CHOD KYI RGYAB YIG NAM MKHA' DRI MED BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,BDAG BLO DAM PA'I DRIN GYIS NGES PA'I DON, ,JI BZHIN MTHONG BA'I BLO MIG RAB DAG PAS, ,TSIG NYUNG DON 'DRIL NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA'I, ,GNAD 'DI BKOD PAS SKAL LDAN DGA' BAR MDZOD, ,GANGS RI THOD DKAR RIN CHEN SNYING PO'I MGUL, ,YON TAN KUN 'BYUNG DGA' BA'I DON LA SKYONG LA MED PAR MDZOD, ,KHREGS CHOD KYI RGYAB YIG NAM MKHA' DRI MED CES BYA BA, ,THEG PA MCHOG GI RNAL 'BYOR PA, ,KLONG CHEN RAB 'BYAMS KYIS GANGS RI THOD DKAR GYI MGUL DU LEGS PAR BKOD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,DPAL SNGAGS KYI SRUNG MA AE KA DZA tI DANG, ,GZA'I DGE BSNYEN R'A HU LA DANG, DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA GSUM LA GTAD DO, ,BKA'I BYA RA GYIS LA YI GE 'DRA MIN BYED PA DANG, SNOD MIN LA BSTAN NA SNYING KHRAG 'THUNGS SHIG ,SKAL LDAN LA MANG DU SPEL CIG ,DGE'O, ,DGE'O, ,DGE'O,, ,,
